alert.note: Alert for Finney; Lane; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Finney, Scott and Lane Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Modoc to near Grigston to 16 miles northwest of Kalvesta. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Scott City and Grigston around 620 PM CDT. Manning around 625 PM CDT. Dighton and Healy around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Scott State Lake, Pendennis and Shields. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
